BlueLadder.NAME: Blue Ladder
DESCRIPTION: You may travel to any room room beside you that your friends have visited.

StringOfFate.NAME: String Of Fate
DESCRIPTION: Tied together by fate, the climbers add their lives together and live and die as a team. Each life lost lowers Max HP by 25%.

BondsOfFate.NAME: Bonds Of Fate
DESCRIPTION: Replaces Strings of Fate and restores your lost lives. Each life lost adds a new Tombstone to your deck.

DimensionalWallet.NAME: Dimensional Wallet
DESCRIPTION: Your team shares #yGold. Gain 100 #yGold per player.

GhostWriter.NAME: Ghost Writer
DESCRIPTION: Exhausted cards are sent to your teammate's deck. Only affects cards in your deck, and not cards created in battle.

MirrorTouch.NAME: Mirror Touch
DESCRIPTION: Your team shares Health and Max Hp. Increase your Max Hp to half again your combined average #g(

PneumaticPost.NAME: Pneumatic Post
DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card of another colour is created, or you pick up a card from the Courier, it is #yUpgraded.

VaporFunnel.NAME: Vapor Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Your team shares Potions. Increases your combined Potion Slots by #g3 to
. NL NL Potion Belts will give half as many slots, and the potion slot penalty will apply to the team.

Dimensioneel.NAME: Dimensioneel
DESCRIPTION: Randomly trade all your non-boss Relics with other players, refreshing their effects if applicable.

BrainFreeze.NAME: Brain Freeze
DESCRIPTION: Start each combat by putting [E] into Brain Freeze. Click on Brain Freeze to gain [E] .

BigHouse.NAME: Big House
DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, each team member with the fewest #yGold, potions, cards, relics, removals, upgrades, or Max HP will gain the corresponding reward. Tied teammates will both recieve the rewards. Additionally, everyone will receive a card.
